string-array.name: notification_content
string-array.item: Babe, wake up! New XKCD just dropped!
Attention stick figure enthusiasts: New XKCD has landed!
Break time! New XKCD has arrived for your procrastination needs
Did someone say existential dread with a side of laughter?
Forget the news, this is important: New XKCD is here!
Your brain needs a workout, so click here!
Go tell your co-workers right now
Your boss won\'t mind if you take a quick break, right?
Your science teacher is so proud that you have these notifications turned on
This is not a drill! I repeat, this is not a drill!
